Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Four groups were used , i ) the PAN group ( 14 ) , ii ) PAN / temocapril ( 13 ) , iii ) temocapril ( 14 ) and iv ) untreated controls ( 15 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| PAN (Phenylalanine Anhydrid) |
| temocapril |

The paragraph mentions two chemical entities: PAN (Phenylalanine Anhydrid) and temocapril. The first group consists of 14 units of PAN, the second group consists of a combination of PAN and temocapril (13 units of temocapril and 1 unit of PAN), and the third group consists of 14 units of temocapril. Therefore, both PAN and temocapril are the valid chemical entities in the paragraph.

The paragraph mentions two chemical entities: Phenylalanine Anhydrid (PAN) and temocapril. The first group consists of PAN, the second group consists of a combination of PAN and temocapril, and the third group consists of temocapril only. Therefore, both PAN and temocapril are the valid chemical entities in the paragraph. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "i)", "ii)", "iii)", and "iv)", do not refer to chemicals and can be disregarded.
